overview:
Since Defunkd’s inception James has taken the sole responsibility for every aspect of the company’s operations.

He founded Defunkd in 2004 as a simple website to support what became an eBay award winning vintage t-shirt enterprise 2007.

Shortly after the site evolved into a comprehensive blog which was followed by the addition of a forum. In 2011 it was further enhanced with a multi-vendor marketplace platform dedicated to vintage t-shirts.
